text: jo log apanee striyon se zihaar karate hain; phir jo baat unhonne kahee thee usase rujoo karate hai, to isase pahale ki donon ek-doosare ko haath lagaen ek gardan aazaad karanee hogee. yah vah baat hai jisakee tumhen naseehat kee jaatee hai, aur tum jo kuchh karate ho allaah usakee khabar rakhata hai
